title: How to design own font
content:
Just want to share font design tutorial that I wrote few years ago:

[https://www.designcontest.com/forum/photography/27301-producing-font-usi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042/https:/www.designcontest.com/forum/photography/27301-producing-font-using-coreldraw-high-logic-font-creator.html "https://www.designcontest.com/forum/photography/27301-producing-font-using-coreldraw-high-logic-font-creator.html")
author: morabira

comments.content:
Thanks for sharing!  
Ever designed Jawi font?  
 [http://typophile.com/files/QB3.3.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042/http:/typophile.com/files/QB3.3.pdf "http://typophile.com/files/QB3.3.pdf")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/74436](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042/http:/typophile.com/node/74436 "http://typophile.com/node/74436")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/120811](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042/http:/typophile.com/node/120811 "http://typophile.com/node/120811")

Berat sama dipikul ringan sama dijinjing?!  
Malaysian heritage is so rich with appealing Jawi handwritings that they motivate any creative font designer like you to convert some into fonts? And if orang Melayu tak pandai Jawi, [who else?!](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042/http:/www.emenang.com/community/index.php?/topic/55037-chinese-fly-high-jawi-win-rm2000-qalambatar)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chinese%20-%20Selamat%20Hari%20Raya_4288.jpg)

Tahun baru Gembira [Morabira](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042/http:/www.morabira.com/)  
Any collaboration with your [Indian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042/http:/murasu.com/mobilejawi) @ [Singaporean](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317144042/http:/airekagrafiks.com/rakas.html) neighbors?!
